name: blender-mcp
description: Complete Blender 3D automation MCP server with 48 tools across 19 categories
author: Blender MCP Team

user_config.name: blender_executable
user_config.title: Blender Executable Path
user_config.description: Path to Blender executable (e.g., C:\Program Files\Blender Foundation\Blender 4.4\blender.exe)

user_config.name: auto_detect_blender
user_config.title: Auto-detect Blender Installation
user_config.description: Automatically find Blender installation if path is not set

user_config.name: operation_timeout
user_config.title: Operation Timeout (seconds)
user_config.description: Maximum time allowed for Blender operations

user_config.name: max_parallel_operations
user_config.title: Maximum Parallel Operations
user_config.description: Maximum number of concurrent Blender operations

user_config.name: enable_gpu_rendering
user_config.title: Enable GPU Rendering
user_config.description: Use GPU acceleration for rendering operations

user_config.name: render_samples
user_config.title: Default Render Samples
user_config.description: Default number of samples for Cycles rendering

user_config.name: temp_directory
user_config.title: Temporary Files Directory
user_config.description: Directory for temporary Blender files and scripts

user_config.name: enable_performance_monitoring
user_config.title: Enable Performance Monitoring
user_config.description: Monitor and log operation performance metrics

user_config.name: backup_blend_files
user_config.title: Backup Blend Files
user_config.description: Create backup copies of modified .blend files

tools.name: blender_mesh
tools.description: Create and manipulate 3D mesh objects (cubes, spheres, primitives)

tools.name: blender_animation
tools.description: Create animations and keyframes for objects

tools.name: blender_export
tools.description: Export scenes for Unity and VRChat

tools.name: list_scenes
tools.description: List all scenes in the project

tools.name: blender_help
tools.description: Get comprehensive help for Blender MCP tools

tools.name: blender_list_tools
tools.description: List all available Blender MCP tools with descriptions

tools.name: blender_search_tools
tools.description: Search for Blender MCP tools by name or description

tools.name: blender_tool_info
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Blender MCP tool

tools.name: blender_categories
tools.description: Get information about all available tool categories

tools.name: blender_status
tools.description: Get comprehensive system status and health information

tools.name: blender_system_info
tools.description: Get detailed system and environment information

tools.name: blender_health_check
tools.description: Perform a comprehensive health check of the Blender MCP system

tools.name: blender_performance_monitor
tools.description: Monitor system performance over a specified duration

tools.name: construct_object
tools.description: Universal 3D object construction using natural language and LLM-generated Blender scripts

prompts.name: blender_quick_start
prompts.description: Get started with basic Blender operations
prompts.template: I need help getting started with Blender automation. Show me how to create a simple scene with a cube, light it, and render it.

prompts.name: blender_modeling_workflow
prompts.template: Guide me through a complete 3D modeling workflow in Blender: creating primitives, applying modifiers, UV mapping, texturing, and exporting.

prompts.name: blender_animation_setup
prompts.template: Help me set up a basic character animation rig with armature, keyframes, and export-ready animation.

prompts.name: blender_game_asset_pipeline
prompts.template: Show me how to create game-ready assets: low-poly models, optimized textures, proper UVs, and export for Unity/Unreal.

prompts.name: blender_physics_simulation
prompts.template: Guide me through setting up realistic physics simulations: rigid bodies, cloth, particles, and baking the results.

prompts.name: blender_rendering_pipeline
prompts.template: Help me set up a professional rendering pipeline: lighting, camera positioning, render settings, and output optimization.

prompts.name: blender_batch_processing
prompts.template: Show me how to batch process multiple Blender files: import assets, apply operations, render turntables, and export results.

prompts.name: blender_troubleshooting
prompts.template: I'm having issues with Blender operations. Help me troubleshoot common problems like crashes, slow performance, and export failures.
